name: Botched Necromancy
description: Find and kill a zombie horde.

dialogue.describe: A summoning ritual went wrong, and now risen dead wander.
dialogue.offer: Well, you see...I was working on my magic practice; summoning, it was, and my...summons went rouge. IF you could stop them for me, I'd appreciate it. Heck, I'll even pay you.
dialogue.advice: They're...tough, let's say. I would recommend keeping your guard up.
dialogue.success: Thank you! I was worried something bad would happen!
dialogue.success_lie: Wonderful. Though, I thought I saw something strange moving about...

dialogue.describe: I've been working on my summoning magic, and I'm building a golem. I need clay, though.
dialogue.offer: I've been working on my summoning magic, and I'm planning building a golem, nothing too fancy. I need clay, however, and I'd appreciate if you could get some for me.
dialogue.advice: I've seen clay deposits near rivers.
dialogue.success: Thank you. It'll be a while before it's ready, though.

name: Wizard's Best Friend Pt. II
description: Get a small relic (a small totem)

dialogue.offer: I've almost got the body finished, though I need something to bind the golem too. Could you get me a small relic of some sort...I don't know how to carve, you see.
dialogue.advice: I think the general store may have one, or you could make one yourself.
